title: League messing up

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I keep dcing and i had the happen to me 2 times so i dodged 2 times so i lost 6 lp and when i open up my client first time it does`nt load second time it blue screens and stays like that forever Fix THIS PLEASE And when i restart my computer it loads then it dcing AGAIN

replies.body: You may have experienced this due to some ISP maintenance that was going on yesterday. If you're still experiencing this now, let me know.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=K63ttumr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-29T23:53:46.235+0000)
>
> You may have experienced this due to some ISP maintenance that was going on yesterday. If you're still experiencing this now, let me know.

im good thank you
> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=K63ttumr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-29T23:53:46.235+0000)
>
> You may have experienced this due to some ISP maintenance that was going on yesterday. If you're still experiencing this now, let me know.

im good thank you but is there anyway to get my 30 lp back because i lost around 30 when this happened

Unfortunately, we're unable to modify your LP for any reason, as the system was designed this way to prevent any abuse.

If you have any other questions, hit me back.
